text: mama randa pawathinne nishchitha de mathaya.

sthuthiyi mahaththayaneni.ema athdakima ibe sidu wuwak nowe.ma wisin hudakala sthanayaka sitiyadi ma palamuwa sitha ek thanakata gena shariraye sahallu kirimata uthsaha kala paya 1 kata wadi kalayak ese kirimen pasuwa ihatha sidu deya wiya.ma mita pera mewani.de sidu kala nomatha uthsaha karada nomatha.e hethuwa nisayi ma obathumagen me pilibandawa wimasuwe.
